title: My dog died (put down) I don't feel sad just numb WHY? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am guessing that it is natures way to protect you. Your body is in a kind of “shock” mode. I was the same condition when I had my last little dog Murray put down. I wandered around like a zombie for days. I was also like that when my dad died. I seemed to operate like a robot. I was just going through the physical motions only . It was like at times my brain was frozen.

I’m so sorry. That’s traumatic and you haven't quite taken it in yet. You were probably so worried in the time leading up to the decision that now that it’s happened, you’re worn out. It’s hard to wrap your head around the fact they won’t be there any more but it passes.
